about_the_game:
Explore Dreams: Dreamcore is an exploration and mystery experience that transports players to a surreal universe filled with nostalgic landscapes, enigmas, and intriguing challenges. With a design inspired by aesthetics like Dreamcore, Vaporwave, and Nostalgicore, the game offers an immersive environment and unique gameplay combining platforming, adventure, and suspense.

Game Modes

Campaign

Journey through a series of fascinating maps and uncover hidden VHS cassette tapes, each playing 3D music that guides your exploration. As you collect the tapes, you unlock the gates blocking the exits of each map, allowing you to progress to new levels. The use of the "eye" is essential for revealing invisible platforms and hidden enemies, which can damage the player upon contact.

Each map presents a unique challenge with platforms and entities that make every level unforgettable. The constant feeling of being watched adds an extra layer of tension and suspense to your journey.

Available Maps:

  • Home - A passage with magical mushrooms and a mysterious red door + A surreal path among colossal clouds and a large dark door.

  • Poolrooms Pink - A pink version of the enigmatic Poolrooms.

  • Poolrooms - The classic submerged and minimalist environment.

  • Nostalgicore House - An isolated house in a field, with a rainbow in the background.

  • Strange - A bucolic setting with a large tree and a morning sun.

  • Vaporwave - A landscape encapsulating the vaporwave aesthetic with vibrant colors and retro elements.

Free Mode

From the main menu, access "Extras" to play Free Mode, exploring maps at your own pace without mission objectives. Perfect for admiring the environments, discovering hidden secrets, and getting lost in the game’s dreamlike atmosphere.

Multiplayer Mode

Compete against other players in an exciting online challenge! Customize your character and participate in matches where the goal is to locate a special chest on the map and deliver it to the designated shop. But beware: other players can steal your chest by passing through you, creating moments of pure adrenaline.

Multiplayer Details:

  • Exclusive Enemy: SCP-173 will chase only the player carrying the chest, identified by a special backpack.

  • Rewards: Earn coins by completing objectives and use them to purchase emotes, character upgrades, and improvements for the campaign mode.

  • Character Customization: Avatar customization is available within the "Multiplayer" button on the main menu.

Atmosphere and Challenges

The feeling of constantly being watched by entities adds a suspenseful atmosphere. You never know when an enemy might be hiding or when a new element of the scenery might appear. The "eye" mechanic encourages detailed exploration and creates moments of pure tension as you navigate the maps.

Why Play Explore Dreams: Dreamcore?

  • Immersive Environment: Detailed scenarios blending nostalgia and surrealism.

  • 3D Soundtrack: Experience dynamic music that enhances immersion.

  • Diverse Modes: Choose between adventure, casual exploration, and competitive challenges.

  • Unique Challenges: Each map brings new platforms, enemies, and mysteries to uncover.

  • Community: Join multiplayer competitions and customize your avatar to stand out.

Ready to explore the unknown? Discover the surreal world of Explore Dreams: Dreamcore and dive into an experience where every map is a new dimension of dreams and challenges!

name: Explore Dreams: Dreamcore

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.3 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Placa De Vídeo 2gb
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX placa de som e drivers compatíveis
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Dual Core 3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Placa De Vídeo 4gb
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX placa de som e drivers compatíveis

short_description: Now you can explore your dreams while solving puzzles...
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support
